actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To include photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors within the temporary suspension of duty on parts of certain electrostatic copying machines, and to extend the suspension until January 1, 1993.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to include photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors within the suspension of duty on parts of certain electrostatic copying machines. Extends such suspension through December 31, 1992.

titles.title: To include photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors within the temporary suspension of duty on parts of certain electrostatic copying machines, and to extend the suspension until January 1, 1993.
